content: I had a friend tell me that veterans from 1947 to 2001 were going to receive some extra money in there SS check ? I have researched this and can't find any information . Has anyone heard of know of this ? Robertmi
reply: I had a friend tell me that veterans from 1947 to 2001 were going to receive some extra money in there SS check ? I have researched this and can't find any information . Has anyone heard of know of this ? Robertmi
title: Social Security raise for veterans

content: I heard of it too, I could not find anything. I e-mailed Soc.Sec. so far no response. I'm gonna check with snopes, I'll let you know what they say! I just checked Snopes, they say they found nothing. The raise thing was probably started by some idiot on the internet! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
